long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is just the Android App SGit converted to run on ChromeOS devices via ARC Welder. All credit for the original app to Rizhen Zhang (https://github.com/sheimi)

Project is at: https://github.com/sheimi/SGit

The UI is intended for use with touchscreen devices so isawkwaard to use in places (eg. swiping between files/commits/status tabs)

As per https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=me.sheimi.sgit
the repos will be stored locally in the folder that you choose when the app first runs (you can change it by clicking the folder icon on the top-left hand side of the apps window) and then in:
/Android/data/me.sheimi.sgit/files/repo
